testcase.name: Login success with standard_user
testcase.system-out: Given user open login page..................................................passed When user login with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"...passed Then user should see product page...........................................passed

testcase.name: Login failed with locked_out_user
testcase.system-out: Given user open login page..................................................passed When user login with username "locked_out_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed Then error message "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out." should be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Login with problem_user shows broken images
testcase.system-out: Given user open login page..................................................passed When user login with username "problem_user" and password "secret_sauce"....passed Then product images should be incorrect.....................................passed
